main event: Observers spotted several unidentified flying objects in Fairpoint, South Dakota from 6 July 1966, between 0345 and 0550Z.
interesting points: Observers reported seeing a red object that disappeared and later reappeared, greenish white objects moving close to the ground, and three yellow objects darting around., The sightings occurred in weather conditions with occasional thunderstorms and scattered clouds., The total length of observation was 1 hour and 30 minutes from one position and 15 minutes from another., The military personnel involved were reliable security policemen from Ellsworth AFB., Investigating officer suspected that sightings could have resulted from low-flying aircraft and reflections on haze patches in the area.
sighted object: Red, greenish white, and yellow objects in the sky
witness description: Military personnel assigned as security policemen from the 82nd Combat Support Group, Ellsworth AFB.
